semantic_identifier: [GOLD-133]: Fix CSV import connector: robust schema validation and clear error reporting
title: Fix CSV import connector: robust schema validation and clear error reporting

sections.text: CSV imports intermittently fail or create malformed issue objects when required columns are missing, renamed, or contain invalid values. Add strict schema validation (required/optional fields, type checks) before ingest and surface actionable, row-level error messages to the user. Ensure failed rows do not partially create themes/issues and that successful rows import deterministically.
